inclusion.criterion: Patients with euvolemic or hypervolemic hyponatremia: serum Na <135 meq/dl
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recent myocardial infarction or cardiac surgery

notes: Patient has euvolemic hyponatremia with serum Na = 137 mEq/l. No history of recent myocardial infarction or cardiac surgery.
